casebody.data:
COOK
v.
COOK 2019-0718 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and DeWine and Donnelly, JJ., dissent.

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On appellant's motion for stay of court of appeals' judgment. Motion granted. Bond posted with the trial court continued pending resolution of this appeal.
